 2018-07972018-06-20,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
PrecisAppointment of CAMILLE ORRIDGE of Toronto, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of Health and the Minister of Finance, to serve as a member of the Advisory Council on the Implementation of National Pharmacare (the Council), to hold office during pleasure for a term ending June 19, 2019.
